game
Class Strategy_CPUEasy

java.lang.Object
  game.Strategy
      game.Strategy_CPUEasy

public class Strategy_CPUEasy
extends Strategy

An extension to the computer strategy. This one just picks a random location and plays it. I've also added a "delay" while the computer thinks.

Author:
Mark
